alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS CROSS NORTH-CENTRAL TO NORTHEASTERN WISCONSIN THIS AFTERNOON... At 247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong scattered thunderstorm developing across northern and northeastern Wisconsin, moving southwest at 15 mph. These will be slow moving storms capable of producing hail up to half inch in size at times and occasional strong wind gusts. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Forest, Lincoln, Vilas, Florence, northeastern Marathon, Marinette, Oneida, Menominee, Oconto, Langlade and Shawano Counties, including the following locations... Gagen, Luna-White Deer Campground, Lake Noseum, Popple River Headwaters Natural Area, Ackley Wildlife Area, Otter Springs Recreation Area, Hayes, Bavaria, Aurora and Deerbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
